meanings.definition: Elmwoods: a type of tree commonly found in North America.
meanings.sent1: The elmwoods in the park provide shade on sunny days.
meanings.sent2: I love walking among the tall elmwoods in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The squirrels in the elmwoods seem to have their own little community.
meanings.sent4: The elmwoods stand tall like guardians of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The rustling leaves of the elmwoods create a soothing melody.

meanings.definition: Elmwoods: a residential neighborhood in a city.
meanings.sent1: The elmwoods neighborhood is known for its friendly residents.
meanings.sent2: I grew up in the Elmwoods area and have many fond memories.
meanings.sent3: The Elmwoods block party is always a highlight of the year.
meanings.sent4: The Elmwoods streets bustle with activity during the holidays.
meanings.sent5: The Elmwoods community center is a hub of social gatherings.

meanings.definition: Elmwoods: a company name specializing in furniture made from elm wood.
meanings.sent1: Elmwoods furniture is known for its quality craftsmanship.
meanings.sent2: I bought a beautiful dining table from Elmwoods last week.
meanings.sent3: The Elmwoods showroom always has the latest designs on display.
meanings.sent4: The Elmwoods logo is engraved on each piece of furniture.
meanings.sent5: The scent of fresh elm wood fills the Elmwoods store.
